ing: 1 tablespoon chopped onion, or more to taste
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
n: Really Good Vegan Caesar Salad Dressing
des: "I've made this recipe several times and it has always come out excellent! Requires a good amount of salt and pepper; always taste and adjust accordingly. Dressing will thicken over time."
ins: Blend water, cashews, lemon juice, sesame seeds, onion, capers, Worcestershire sauce, Dijon mustard, garlic, salt, and black pepper together in a blender until smooth.
